title: '@JulianCastro coming with the straight up truth': AOC livetweets the Democratic debate
text:
CLOSE

Although Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, D-N.Y. was not at the Democratic debate, her presence loomed large as an outspoken, progressive member of the Democratic caucus.

As candidates sparred over issues like Medicare for All and income inequality, Ocasio-Cortez delivered her own commentary on Twitter. The New York Democrat has not yet endorsed a presidential candidate.

As Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt., defended Medicare for All, Ocasio-Cortez tweeted a video fo the exchange, saying, "Thank you! There are too many plans out there that seem more interested in protecting corporate profits than protecting the lives of working Americans. We need #MedicareForAll, and we need it now."

More: A 'purity test'? Democratic candidates clash over guns in feisty debate

She shared another update about Sen. Cory Booker's comments on abortion rights, in which the New Jersey Democrat argued men needed to be allies to women as fellow human beings.

She quoted another line from former HUD Secretary Julian Castro, who had quipped that President Donald Trump was "caging kids at the border while letting ISIS go free."

"@JulianCastro coming with the straight up truth," she wrote.

“This president is caging kids at the border while letting ISIS go free.”@JulianCastro coming with the straight up truth. — Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (@AOC) October 16, 2019

"Tax the rich," she tweeted, during a debate over income inequality.

The Sanders campaign then quoted her tweet with the comment, "When we are in the White House, that is exactly what we will do."

When we are in the White House, that is exactly what we will do. https://t.co/lWLXzl8Lh3 — Bernie Sanders (@BernieSanders) October 16, 2019

That tweet prompted some speculation about the Sanders' campaign strategy, especially as the Sanders campaign promoted a coming rally in Queens, New York, with a "special guest."

"Subtweet: Endorse me plssssss," wrote Newsday reporter Emily Ngo.

Others guessed the "special guest" would be Ocasio-Cortez.

Okay so Bernie said he is holding a big rally in QUEENS, NEW YORK .



He said there will be a SPECIAL GUEST .



AOC is from queens . — Grumpy Birdie Sanders (@grumpybirdieS) October 16, 2019

Bernie Sanders just said he's going to have a special guest at his rally in Queens, New York. I think it's going to be Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez. #DemocraticDebate4pic.twitter.com/pl9Zss8QvA — Krishan Patel (@IAmKrishanPatel) October 16, 2019

OK, who is going to be this “special guest” at Bernie Sanders’ rally in Queens this weekend?



Lots of people think it’s going to be Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez since it is in her district.



I think this might be Bernie’s best night.#DemocraticDebatepic.twitter.com/ykOqtVZNVP — Russell Drew (@RussOnPolitics) October 16, 2019

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/elections/2019/10/15/aoc-livetweets-democratic-presidential-debate/3993646002/
description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez tweeted "Tax the rich" during a discussion over income inequality during the Democratic debate.
